name: Alona Kuznietsova
description: Qualified Junior Frontend Developer with 2 years of practical experience in web application development. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, with expertise in modern frameworks such as React, Next.js. Possesses foundational knowledge in backend technologies (Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, RestAPI) and basic DevOps principles. Served as Team Lead and Scrum Master, enhancing leadership and organizational skills. Committed to continuous professional growth and business process optimization.
